data.title: Special Date Night
data.text: The ambience is excellent in this warm southern home. There are several dining rooms and the bar has a pianist who was excellent. Several dishes, salads, main dishes and desserts, are prepared table side. The food and service were both five star.

data.title: Romantic Dining
data.text: The Veranda is a lovely romantic restaurant with excellent food and impeccable service.  Set in a lovely old house, restored to its original grand style. Waiters wear tuxedos and attend to your every wish.  The cocktail lounge is a great place to have a drink or two with its live piano music from it's piano bar.  A great place for a wonderful evening.

data.title: Excellent food and wine.  Service A rated.
data.text: The food was excellent.  All entrees come with a salad.  Most entrees are in the high $30's.  Service was excellent.

data.title: Outstanding Meal
data.text: The staff, the food, and the atmosphere are fantastic. Our waiter was courteous and a great help in making our dinner selections.  The dinner was very good and the dessert was just as good.  We will always come back when in Fort Myers.

data.title: Celebration
data.text: This restaurant was absolutely delightful!  The food was more than delicious and our server Pete, treated us as if we were the only patrons on site. I cannot wait to go again.

data.title: Old Time Florida feel
data.text: Great service and a very nice atmosphere that brings in the old Florida charm.   Food is great.  Have a drink at the old wooden bar before your meal --  and enjoy some music from the piano. Very nice evening.

data.title: Best Food, Service and Vibe in Fort Myers
data.text:
If you are a food lover and looking for a nice place to eat - family or couple this is the best spot in Fort Myers. We have a family home here and we dine out often trying new places. When we want to get out of our jean shorts & eat delish food - we get dressed up and go to the veranda! 

Ask for Peter - because a great dining experience is not just about amazing food and rich decor - his professional service tops the night off perfectly. He is wonderful company and makes it all that much more enjoyable !

He was so kind to let me take some of their hand made red pepper jelly and gave me more than we had left over. ( comes with your table bread and it's out of this world)

Pictures of our scallops and lamb, both are delish.

data.title: A jewel
data.text:
For fine dining in Ft Myers, I have not found a better place. Waiters are well trained and experienced; Caesar salad made tableside; piano bar while waiting for  your table, it is fine dining at its best in this city. I'll bet the waiters will even ask jerks to remove their hats.
This is a spot for special occasions, or just a chance to get away from burgers and shrimp.

data.title: Great Restaurant with cool ambiance
data.text: There's little one can say when everyone loved the food, service and ambiance. We even found a parking space right outside the door!

data.title: Missed a few key items
data.text:
Received a gift card for this restaurant.  Oscar our waiter made the night!  He was very personable and professional.  The lamb chops were excellent as well as the scallops.  
What could be improved:  The bread and butter.  Butter was frozen-thus hard to cut and put on the bread.  There was nothing extraordinary about the bread.  What was disappointing was watching the waiters and bussers continually "borrowing" items from each other's tables since they was not enough inventory.  This included candles, flowers, and silverware.  The bussers need more training as well.  They tried to clear plates when I still had a fork in my hand.   It is these finishing touches that make it worth the value.  The owner needs to invest in training and inventory.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: We greatly enjoyed our dinner last night. The setting is elegant and comfortable, the service is true to southern hospitality, and the food just delicious. The oysters Rockefeller were perfectly cooked and the Bourbon tournedos extremely tender. The key lime pie was one of the best we ever had. What a delightful experience!

data.title: An old jewel
data.text: My wife and I got married in the courtyard and had our reception in the atrium. Always a standard of quality. I love the rack of lamb.

data.title: The best all around restaurant in Fort Myers
data.text: Just a couple of blocks from the historic downtown district, our first visit to the Veranda was just as expected. Mike our server was great, the ambiance of the restaurant is perfect for date night and the food was very good. The only concern was that the rice in one of the entree's was overcooked and dry. Everything else about the restaurant was great.

data.title: Charming and Elegant
data.text: One of our favorite restaurants. Have never been disappointed. Lots of ambiance and excellent food. Wait staff is the best. Highly recommend for a special meal whether it be lunch or dinner

data.title: Upscale but old fashioned restaurant in the heart of Fort Myers
data.text: We have been to this restaurant twice. Food is good, but overrated. Service is excellent and the atmosphere is quiet. Good for catching up with old friends.

data.title: good food nice accomadations
data.text: We have visited the Veranda many times and always have enjoyed the experience. We have lived in the area for 13 years and this is still one of our favorites.

data.title: Elegant dining downtown
data.text: Our second visit, and once again we had the pleasure of having Peter as our server.  Dinner was delicious, and the service was impeccable.  You go to the Veranda to dine, not just to eat.

data.title: Good food
data.text: This place is very pretty inside and outside. Food was pricey but very good. The only complaint I have is we sat very close to another table that ordered the spinach salad prepared table-side. I have seen the chef come out at restaurants to finish off a meal table-side but this was done by the waiter. He started cooking the bacon and it was crackling and throwing bacon grease all over my back. Then they ordered the chateaubriand also cooked table -side by the waiter. Flame as high as it could go cooking veggies, smoke blowing all over me. I left there smelling like I just spent an eight hour shift in their kitchen.

data.title: Beautiful restaurant and bar
data.text: We went to The Veranda for drinks and to listen to the piano players. What a beautiful place to dine or for drinks. They were booked for dinner so call ahead for reservations. I will next time.

data.title: Outstanding!
data.text: This is our go-to place for special occasions, and we've never been less than delighted.  The service is very professional without being pretentious, the food is delicious, and the wine list is extensive. The interior decor is inviting and the outdoor courtyard is lovely when the weather is right.
